Quickstrike:






Quickstrike was unsettled at the fight with Sinesis against Mantella. He's 
seen her before. He wanted to help her in that short quarrel, but his 
damaged limited him.

As she approached him, he lifted his head, his left claw shaking. "Course ya 
can join," he said to her. "Mentella, right? Mighty sorry that ah went 
spooky on ya back there in th' forest. Recent days ain't been good t' me as 
ya can see." He tapped his right claw against the side of his damaged left 
foreclaw. "Ya damaged? Ah'm goin' t' th' CR chambers."

Then he thought of something. He commanded the computer: "Computer, shields 
up!" He then said to Mantella, "We's be safe now, eh?" He took a few steps 
forward. He received Silverstyke's transmission.

He said into his comm-link, "Silverstryke? Sure! Ya can join. Ah'll send 
some tin-horn t' come get ya." This may be a way in repaying him for 
bringing him back on-line.

He shouted into the hallway, after Sinesis, "Hey Sinesis! Ah need ya t' do 
uh job! Want ya t' find uh bot named Silverstryke and bring him here! He's 
one of us."
